bug.author: SZUHvern
bug.description: when i use 'sh data/get_coco_dataset.sh' it produced an error: data/get_coco_dataset.sh: 30: data/get_coco_dataset.sh: Syntax error: "(" unexpected My system is ubuntu16.04, I don't know if it is this problem.

comments.comment: The script works as intended on linux. The command is bash data/get_coco_dataset.sh
